thread.title: ‘Happy Dussehra’: Shahid Kapoor, Amitabh Bachchan, Lata Mangeshkar celebrate triumph of ‘good over evil’
thread.title_full: ‘Happy Dussehra’: Shahid Kapoor, Amitabh Bachchan, Lata Mangeshkar celebrate triumph of ‘good over evil’

title: ‘Happy Dussehra’: Shahid Kapoor, Amitabh Bachchan, Lata Mangeshkar celebrate triumph of ‘good over evil’
text: ‘Happy Dussehra’: Shahid Kapoor, Amitabh Bachchan, Lata Mangeshkar celebrate triumph of ‘good over evil’ Thursday, 22 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) Celebrities like Lata Mangeshkar, Amitabh Bachchan and Shahid Kapoor among others took to Twitter to celebrate the festival and greet all with blessings.
